summary: Detail-oriented and innovative data science analyst with extensive experience in data-driven solutions and a strong foundation in programming and data structures. Currently pursuing a Masters in Computational Data Analytics, I bring a robust set of skills including Python, SQL, and machine learning techniques, refined through impactful projects and internships. Seeking a rewarding internship at Netflix where I can leverage my expertise in designing scalable data solutions, building robust data pipelines, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive business insights.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology & Science, Pilani

bullets: Increased efficiency by 30% by revamping a demand forecasting solution for a $11 Billion Brewing Company using AutoML (LightGBM and XGBoost), and performed feature attribution to identify key drivers and actionable distribution insights.

Reduced inventory wastage by 20% by redesigning a 5-year forward forecast using Linear ARIMA and Prophet models, providing critical insights at the provincial level for strategic planning and inventory management.

Brought 10% improvement in SKU detection accuracy for a global beverage company by addressing YOLOv5 limitations and training a customized YOLOv7 (state-of-the-art object detection model) model with optimized hyperparameters.
Utilized topic modeling to cluster unstructured Hindi text data into well-defined topics, creating a structured dataset that improved audience understanding and increased engagement by 15%.
Collaborated with brand advertisers and management to identify needs and develop targeted campaigns using Twitter APIs, increasing positive sentiment and broadening customer base.
Developed a sophisticated Python analytics tool that processed 500,000+ Twitter data points, enabling precise audience segmentation and empowering the marketing team with actionable insights.

projects.title: Fast-dLLM v2 Inference Optimization
projects.description: Implemented token-level compute skipping in Fast-dLLM v2 generation by caching prior-step hidden states and reusing outputs for "stable" masked tokens; evaluated on GSM8K, achieving ~24% FLOPs reduction (proxy) with only a small accuracy drop at the best threshold. Added layer-level skipping inside the decoder forward() loop with cosine-similarity stability gating and KV-cache safety; built instrumentation to explain the threshold "cliff" and produce accuracy-compute tradeoff curves.

projects.title: Feasibility of Lie Detection in the Metaverse
projects.description: Achieved 87% model accuracy by engineering a multimodal ML pipeline combining eye-tracking and voice transcription features to detect deception in VR; results presented as a poster at IEEE VR 2025. Implemented perception studies and ethical audits to quantify user trust and fairness in AI-driven Metaverse experiences, informing UX guidelines for future VR platforms.

projects.title: Covid Misinformation Spread
projects.description: Analyzed the dissemination patterns of Covid misinformation across Twitter, processing data from 100,000+ tweets that informed a research paper, now under peer review, aimed at combating false narratives. Fine-tuned embeddings from Word2vec, Glove, Fasttext, and BERT for deep learning model classification. Implemented LDA for topic modeling and deployed Plutchik's transformer model for emotion detection in tweets.
